name: AILE_I: SUMMER SPLASH TOURNAMENT
description:
My 10+ Days of work for the SummerJam created by PixelGameMaker MV. 

AILE_I: SUMMER SPLASH TOURNAMENT
An arcade shooting team battle I created for the SummerJam by PixelGameMaker MV. 

  • Important Information
  • -This game Included 5 total of characters to play with different weapon and Booster pack's ability
  • Shop and Unlocks! Try to collect as many CRAB as you can while fighting and use them to buy new characters and Booster in Shop menu
  • Custom Parts menu is where you choose to select character and Booster pack for playing 
  • Game has Pre-Random Map. You can expect 3 diferrent map for each round (Total 9). 
  • Basic Mouse and Keyboard control *This game was recommend to play with controller but incase you don't have one.
  • Basic movement: W,A,S,D / D-Pad 
  • ATTACK: L.Mouse click / Press X Button 
  • EVADE: Spacebar / Press A Button 
  • Zoom: Z / LB Button 
  • OK: L.Mouse click / Press A Button 
  • Cancel: R.Mouse click / Press B Button
